about: New York University (NYU) is a prestigious global institution renowned for its academic excellence and vibrant urban campus in the heart of New York City. NYU Tandon School of Engineering, located in Brooklyn, is a hub for innovation, offering cutting-edge programs in engineering, technology, and applied sciences, fostering a dynamic community of future-focused thinkers and creators.

Established in 1955, the Institute of Business Administration (IBA) Karachi stands as a prestigious academic institution in Pakistan. Renowned for its commitment to excellence, IBA offers a diverse range of undergraduate and graduate programs in business, economics, and social sciences. With a rich history, IBA Karachi continues to shape future leaders through rigorous education and a focus on practical skills, contributing significantly to the country's business and academic landscape.
